snippet: A Jewish advisory body said the decline may have been due to a recent lack of “trigger events” in the Middle East.
abstract: Community Security Trust, which advises Britain's estimated 260,000 Jews on safety issues, reports that anti-Semitic incidents recorded in Great Britain have fallen to the lowest annual level since 2005.
lead_paragraph: A Jewish advisory body said the decline may have been due to a recent lack of “trigger events” in the Middle East.
